item.title: New Site
item.description: Trying this again, apparently. Back in mid-2020, I decided to set up a blog. I set up a GitHub Pages site, a build pipeline to generate my static site with Hugo, and wrote my first post. And then I never updated my blog again, and eventually deleted it outright. But now I’m making another attempt. But why? I want to talk about stuff. Seriously, that’s it. I started a bigger-than-anticipated project involving Pokemon GBA ROM hacking (more on that in a future post) and realized that I really wanted to talk about what I was doing and the headaches I ran into trying to decipher the data structures in a Pokemon Emerald cartridge dump.
